documentation.text:
@title LendingPool contract
 @dev Main point of interaction with the DARSH protocol's market
 - Users can:
   # Create Lending/Borrowing offers
   # Request for new terms on offers
   # Repay (Fully/Installment)
   # Claim principal and earnings
   # Claim back collateral
   # Cancel/Reject/Accept requests
 - All admin functions are callable by the deployer address
 @author Arogundade Ibrahim*
@dev contract version
@dev for convienency this address is used to represent FTM just like ERC20

@notice This function creates a new lending offer

devdoc.author: Arogundade Ibrahim*
devdoc.details: Main point of interaction with the DARSH protocol's market - Users can:   # Create Lending/Borrowing offers   # Request for new terms on offers   # Repay (Fully/Installment)   # Claim principal and earnings   # Claim back collateral   # Cancel/Reject/Accept requests - All admin functions are callable by the deployer address

acceptBorrowingOffer(uint256,uint16).details: The percentage params specifies the portion of the offer to accept

acceptLendingOffer(uint256,uint16,addres.details: The percentage params specifies the portion of the offer to accept

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

cancelRequest(uint256).details: Request can only be calncelled by the request creator

claimBorrowedPrincipal(uint256).details: Can only be called by the borrower

claimCollateral(uint256).details: Can only be called by the borrower

claimDefaultCollateral(uint256).details: Can only be called by the lender

claimPrincipal(uint256).details: Can only be called by the lender

createLendingOffer(uint256,address,addre.details: the principalAmount_ parameter is use for ERC20 tokens only

liquidateLoan(uint256).details: this function will liquidate a loan when it has pass maturity date + grace days. It can be call by anyone

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

rejectRequest(uint256).details: Request can only be rejected by the offer creator

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayLiquidatedLoan(uint256).details: Liquidated loans cannot be repaid by percentage

repayLoan(uint256,uint16).details: The percentage params specifies the portion to be repaid

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

nativeAddress.details: for convienency this address is used to represent FTM just like ERC20
